31256788-71fb-4003-a9ca-9e6164a8faa3.title: SMAR Driver (Gen 8)
31256788-71fb-4003-a9ca-9e6164a8faa3.description: The brain of the race car. Connects to the SMAR Engine and steering bearings. Handles perception, decision making, and actions. Must be placed on a lift to initialize car dimensions correctly.

74bfdcd7-cfb2-4791-9611-602154eb90dd.title: SMAR Engine (Gen 8)
74bfdcd7-cfb2-4791-9611-602154eb90dd.description: The heart of the car. Connects to the Driver and wheel bearings. Simulates RPM, torque, and gears. Features custom audio and tuning support.

4af0f758-21b4-446b-9196-afeefbbe5adb.title: SMAR Track Scanner
4af0f758-21b4-446b-9196-afeefbbe5adb.description: Generates racing lines. Place at the start/finish line facing the track direction. Interact to scan or toggle visibility. Use the hammer to edit nodes manually.

7cb34732-7938-4e50-9db3-bdb57e3ab2b7.title: SMAR Track Loader
7cb34732-7938-4e50-9db3-bdb57e3ab2b7.description: Saves and loads track data. Place near the start line to save the generated track to the world or blueprint. Essential for persisting track layouts.

1e3b7ff3-d066-4b8b-9cb1-fa4a6ad8cc7c.title: SMAR Downforce Unit
1e3b7ff3-d066-4b8b-9cb1-fa4a6ad8cc7c.description: Applies aerodynamic downforce to the vehicle. Adjust force by interacting ('E' to increase, Crouch+'E' to decrease). Improves cornering grip.

5703a73b-206c-420f-b75d-03ad028ebe6d.title: SMAR Race Control
5703a73b-206c-420f-b75d-03ad028ebe6d.description: Manages the race state (Practice, Qualifying, Race). Connect logic inputs to start/stop. Interacting opens the race settings menu.

54cea7fe-d26f-4660-b882-0a25cf4db710.title: SMAR Checkpoint
54cea7fe-d26f-4660-b882-0a25cf4db710.description: Defines track segments and splits. Place sequentially around the track after scanning. Auto-connects splines. Shoot to clear nodes.

895664c9-dec0-43eb-9c57-6315c907c6cf.title: SMAR Camera
895664c9-dec0-43eb-9c57-6315c907c6cf.description: Static trackside camera. Used for broadcasting angles. Requires external scripts for full functionality.

90137355-8dda-404c-b19b-80a10b75729c.title: Brake Light Controller
90137355-8dda-404c-b19b-80a10b75729c.description: Visual feedback for braking. Connect the Driver to this, and this to the brake lights. Lights up when the AI applies brakes.

9c327ca3-5dbe-46ad-9910-7b362964377d.title: SMAR Pit Point
9c327ca3-5dbe-46ad-9910-7b362964377d.description: Defines the pit lane path. Use specific colors to designate the path type (entry, lane, exit).

b27a43d6-a8f1-4973-b5df-c39e5c4cdeb8.title: SMAR Pit Box
b27a43d6-a8f1-4973-b5df-c39e5c4cdeb8.description: Designates the stopping area for pit stops. Place in the pit lane where cars should service. Resizable.
